description: From flat trails to mountain trails to anything in between, a good hiking sock can make all the difference between “Yay! and “Nay! With light cushioning in all the right places, breathability through body-mapped mesh zones, and a comfort welt with stay-put fit, our Hike Light Cushion Great Excursion Print Crew Socks will help put a spring in your step, whether you’re on your first mile or your last. What could be better for you next great excursion?
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Great Excursion Print Crew Socks - Mens
